desc: Need a car simulator.The user interface (car controls) remains on the android mobile device.The computation engine for simulating the Physics of the car should be implemented on the RaspberryPi 3.The Mobile Device and the RPi for a single car should be connected by USB.There should 3 cars controlled by 3 people on 3 android devices and will drive on the same track together (Multiplayer simulator).Each person should be able to see ALL the cars, and know their positions dynamically.Information about the mechanics for a particular car resides with the corresponding RPi, but all the RPis in the same WiFi network will have to communicate with each other and dynamically exchange information about their cars in REAL TIME. This information will be used by all the cars to know relevant details about the other cars.Driving should be implemented in 2 modes:City Driving Mode: where the RPi’s will exchange information with each other, and if needed, override the control signals from their respective drivers to ensure that the cars do not crash.Racing Mode: where the control signals from the drivers override the safe autonomous driving if needed.Project deliverables: .apk for car control and all files executing on RPiMilestone will be released after 100% completion of work and after checking the working.
title: Write an Android application

desc: Mobile App Requirement:Looking for a developer to build an app using hybrid technology (like apache cordova) the app should work on both OS – iOS and AndroidOther technologies: AngularApp concept: Neighbourhood securityApp features:1.	Emergency alarm notificationa.	Notify all users with emergency alarm notificationb.	Notification contains details of the user who has raised alarmc.	Users should get warning tone set for this alarm2.	Custom message notification to all usersa.	General notification with default notification set on phoneb.	Example – user can send message to all users about house being vacant for watch3.	Unknown stranger notificationa.	Users can notify all users about some suspect or unknown strangerb.	User should be able to take pic and send all users the pic with messagec.	Option to send notification as anonymous4.	Parking bay requesta.	Users able to request for parking space required – notification goes to all usersb.	Response to the user’s request – one on one message not to all users5.	Complains for management companya.	Users should be able to send complain/suggestionb.	All users should be able to send their opinion (public or private)c.	Response can be with comment and picsd.	Next to the title of complaint it should have count for number user support and disagreee.	Response(comment/pic) can be updated at any user who posted the response and no one else can change apart from super admin6.	Users profilea.	User can add/update their name, photo(optional), door number, lane name7.	Contact details requesta.	User can send request about requirement of gardener service, etcb.	Response can go public or privatec.	Responder should be able to respond with name, number, company name(optional), comment(optional)8.	CCTV image request or information request of incidenta.	Users can send request of details(image, video or comments) with supplied date timeb.	Response can go public or private to the user made request9.	Unknown car parked in allocated baya.	User should be able to submit with following details – Bay number, Pic(optional), Number Plate(optional), Laneb.	All user receive notification about the warning with standard notification10.	Custom requirementa.	User able to send request about requirement like need a ladder, help with loading something, laptop/mobile chargers or any stuff requiredb.	Request can go with comment(title and description) and pic(option)c.	Response can be private or public11.	User can invite/suggest for event/partya.	Users should be able to send respond with comments12.	Warninga.	User able to notify all users about expected noise due to party of work scheduled to be carried outb.	Send request using date and time(from and to)13.	Postage requesta.	Users able to request if they can request to receive a post or parcel for someone due to their absenceb.	Response can be private or public14.	Remindera.	Reminder set by super admin onlyb.	For example – reminder for all users for bin pick date/time set by adminc.	This notification can be disabled by all users if they don’t need one15.	New feature requesta.	Users able to send suggestion to super admin about feature required within the appNotes:Phones numbers, car registration, etc  - UK standardPrivate – Notification/response just goes to the person sending request and super adminSuper admin – able to update/delete any request or responses or block user(s) using the appUser downloading app should be able to see feature list before downloading the appApp welcome text and description should be able to be updated by åsuper adminSuper admin should be able to set option for public or private availability for every featureThese requirements are for Phase 1, there will be more Phase 2 work on successful completion of Phase 1 and based feedback from users.Also, there will be work for more apps if work quality and support is satisfactory.
title: App Development using Hybrid technology
